fields.description: Current date of the plan, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Time units to be used for the resource report: hours, days, weeks
Specifies the number of days (value can be decimal) sales orders should be planned ahead of their due date to take into account for an administrative lead time. Default: 0
Controls the verbosity of the planning log file. Accepted values are 0(silent - default), 1 and 2 (verbose)
Controls whether safety stock is planned before or after the demand. Accepted values are false (default) and true
When set to true, the algorithm will better distribute the demand across alternate suboperations instead of using the preferred operation
Specifies a calendar with dates to which the plan is aligned
Set the currency symbol, defaults to suffix, add a comma after the symbol to make it a prefix
